title: New: JJ Adrian – The Show
body:
Really glad this dropped into my inbox earlier this evening.

Hugely ambitious, sleek soulful pop from Vancouver’s **JJ Adrian** on his latest track, _The Show_. Lifted from a mixtape titled Priorities, coming later this year, if The Show and the other tracks on his Soundcloud are anything to go by, then it could be a rather special release. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
